description: Erection of a mansard-style roof extension, a two storey rear extension and cycle and refuse storage to facilitate conversion of a 5 bedroom HMO (Use Class C4) into a 9 bedroom HMO (Sui generis)
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8ad7510a-7fff-e6d0-c070-bb2244de607b"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><ol></ol></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">In the absence of a Unilateral Undertaking or a Section 106 Agreement securing appropriate mitigation by restricting future occupiers of the development from obtaining parking permits within the Controlled Parking Zone, the proposed development would likely exacerbate existing parking stress and congestion on the surrounding highway network. The development would, therefore, be contrary to Policy LP45 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020) and Policy T6 of the London Plan (2021).</span></p>

<p>The proposed development would result in the loss of a single family dwelling, for which there is demonstrable need within the Borough. The proposed conversion fails to safeguard adequate stock of a single family house contrary to policies LP22 and LP12 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3b96e786-7fff-d809-5035-58f533e2a2bb"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">By reason of the substandard quality of accommodation proposed, the proposed large House in Multiple Occupation would be detrimental to the living conditions of future occupiers. The proposed development would, therefore, conflict with Policies LP2 and LP22 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4e957a73-7fff-8343-7f73-1d684a1f3031"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><ol></ol></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">In the absence of a Unilateral Undertaking or a Section 106 Agreement to secure appropriate rent levels in accordance with the Local Housing Allowance, the development would fail to secure the proposed House in Multiple Occupation at an affordable rent level, contrary to Policy LP22 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cebf504f-7fff-12a1-fc80-3b58d05e974a"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: justify;">By reason of the inadequate provision of cycle parking storage which is safe, secure and accessible for all, the proposed development would fail to meet cycle parking standards as required by Policy LP42 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span><br></p><p style="list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p>
